message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to its worth to me. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I appreciate your offer, $950,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $1,100,000. This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between the value of the product to you and my budget.
